attributes.action: grant people who have had operations the chance to join the UK forces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: some people are refused the chance to join the UKs armed forces because they have had certain operations. some operations have life lasting effects i.e. club foot which reduces movement in the foot usually only having 35%. however some people regain more movement than someone who has broken a bone.
